about_the_game:
BAD IS BACK! Castle Doombad is the treacherous strategy / Tower Defense puzzler where you play the villain and must defend against the pesky heroes so-rudely invading your evil lair.

This Classic edition includes the original Castle Doombad from 2014, newly rebuilt and remastered from the ground up, plus the addition of brand-new content and features.

IT'S GOOD TO BE BAD!

Slay the good guys with your choice of over two dozen delightfully devious traps and minions! Strategically mix-n-match your arsenal with wicked weapons that fire automatically and manually-activated traps that require precision timing to pack a painful punch! Unlock and upgrade your traps, troops, and castle on your quest to become the baddest of them all!

TWO WAYS TO SLAY!

Break bad across and defend your dark domain across 75 puzzling stages, or take on the nefarious new roguelite mode: Dr. Lord Evilstein's Roguevenge!

In this new mode, the challenge is ramped up, and no two attempts are the same. Choose how your castle expands as you advance, grow your trap arsenal during each run, and collect mighty Nightmare powers to make the heroes pray for a quick Game Over...

SINISTER STYLE!

Collect loot from fallen heroes to deck out your Dark Lord and his control room! Each item includes a Baddie Bonus upgrade -- but your equipment spots are limited, so prepare to tinker with different diabolical builds.

FIENDISH FEATURES:

  • Includes the original Castle Doombad from 2014 remastered and rebuilt from the ground up -- with no ads and no IAP!

  • Play the original 75 puzzling stages, or try your evil hand at the challenging new replayable roguelite mode!

  • Unlock an antagonistic arsenal of 29 traps and over 150 upgrades!

  • Customize your Dark Lord and your control room with new equipment and cosmetics, or collect reskins for your traps and troops

  • For the first time, play the original Castle Doombad with a mouse+keyboard!

  • Play on Steam Deck with touch screen controls (button and joystick support coming soon)

  • Earn sinister Steam Achievements!

  • New villainous content coming with free future updates!

STAY UPDATED!

Add Castle Doombad Classic to your wishlist now to receive updates, or keep up with development by following one of our social media accounts or joining our official Discord Community.

Castle Doombad Classic is from the team that brought you Steven Universe: The Light Trilogy, Super Mole Escape, Teeny Titans 1+2, and more!

reviews:
“Castle Doombad nails everything I could want in a ‘defense’ title and should be played.”
5/5 stars – TouchArcade

“I really loved Castle Doombad’s deft mixture of intricate and addictive game play. It’s a slam-bang journey that does so much good that sometimes breaking bad is the only way to go.”
9/10 – Arcade Sushi

“When Destructoid CEO Hamza Aziz sent Castle Doombad across my desk ... I wasn’t drawn to it. Six hours later I lost track of time — it was 2AM, and I had been playing Castle Doombad nonstop.”
9.5/10 – Destructoid
short_description: BE THE VILLAIN and slay any hero who dares enter your dark domain! Deck out your castle with traps and minions as the ultimate diabolical dungeon keeper in this strategy / TD puzzler. Includes the original Castle Doombad game, rebuilt and remastered, plus brand new content.
